columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: service_contact_key
columns.dc:title: Service Contact Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each service contact. The Service Contact Key is unique and stable for each service contact at the level of the organisation.

columns.name: episode_key
columns.dc:title: Episode Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each episode. The Episode Key is unique and stable for each episode at the level of the organisation.

columns.name: practitioner_key
columns.dc:title: Practitioner Key
columns.schema:description: A unique identifier for a practitioner within the provider organisation.

columns.name: service_contact_date
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Date
columns.schema:description: The date of each mental health service contact between a health service provider and patient/client.

columns.name: service_contact_type
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Type
columns.schema:description: The main type of service provided in the service contact, as represented by the service type that accounted for most provider time.

columns.name: service_contact_postcode
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Postcode
columns.schema:description: The Australian postcode where the service contact took place.

columns.name: service_contact_modality
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Modality
columns.schema:description: How the service contact was delivered, as represented by a code.

columns.name: service_contact_participants
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Participants
columns.schema:description: An indication of who participated in the Service Contact.

columns.name: service_contact_venue
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Venue
columns.schema:description: Where the service contact was delivered, as represented by a code.

columns.name: service_contact_duration
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Duration
columns.schema:description: The time from the start to finish of a service contact.

columns.name: service_contact_copayment
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Copayment
columns.schema:description: The co-payment is the amount paid by the client per session.

columns.name: service_contact_participation_indicator
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Client Participation Indicator
columns.schema:description: An indicator of whether the client participated, or intended to participate, in the service contact, as represented by a code.

columns.name: service_contact_interpreter
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Interpreter Used
columns.schema:description: Whether an interpreter service was used during the Service Contact

columns.name: service_contact_no_show
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - No Show
columns.schema:description: Where an appointment was made for an intended participant(s), but the intended participant(s) failed to attend the appointment, as represented by a code.

columns.name: service_contact_final
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Final
columns.schema:description: An indication of whether the Service Contact is the final for the current Episode of Care

columns.name: service_contact_tags
columns.dc:title: Service Contact - Tags
columns.schema:description: List of tags for the service contact.
